controls.label: IP address
controls.help: DataSync Agent IP address to retrieve activation key during resource creation. Conflicts with activation_key. DataSync Agent must be accessible on port 80 from where Terraform is running.

controls.label: (Source) NFS location name
controls.help: Specify a name for this nfs location

controls.label: (Source) NFS server hostname
controls.help: Specifies the IP address or DNS name of the NFS server.

controls.label: (Source) NFS server subdirectory
controls.help: (Source) Subdirectory within the NFS server to perform actions as source. Should be exported by the NFS server.

controls.label: (Destination) S3 bucket Name
controls.help: S3 Bucket name for the destination.

controls.label: (Destination) S3 bucket object prefix
controls.help: (Destination) Prefix to perform actions within the S3 bucket.

controls.label: VPC ID
controls.help: The ID of the VPC in which the vpc endpoint will be used.

controls.label: Security groups ids to assign to the vpc endpoint
controls.help: The ID of one or more security groups to associate with the network interface for the vpc endpoint.

controls.label: Subnets Ids to assing to the vpc endpoint.
controls.help: The ID of one or more subnets in which to create a network interface for the vpc endpoint.

controls.label: Security group id to assing to the datasync agent.
controls.help: The ID of the security group used to protect your data transfer task subnets.

controls.label: Subnet id for the datasync agent.
controls.help: The subnet id in which DataSync will create elastic network interfaces for each data transfer task.
